## ⚠️ STOP — Is this a vulnerability?

**If you found a security vulnerability, DO NOT open this issue.**

Instead, report it privately:
- Go to the **Security** tab → **"Report a vulnerability"**
- Or email: [your@email.com]

Reporting vulnerabilities publicly puts all users at risk.
